1: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּשְׂמַ֨ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>Rejoice</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>not O Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>with</n> גִּיל֙ <sup>1524 </sup> <n>for joy</n> כָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>as [other] people</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זָנִ֖יתָ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>for thou hast gone a whoring</n> מֵעַ֣ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>from thy God</n> אָהַ֣בְתָּ <sup>157 </sup> <n>thou hast loved</n> אֶתְנָ֔ן <sup>868 </sup> <n>a reward</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> גָּרְנ֥וֹת <sup>1637 </sup> <n>threshing</n> דָּגָֽן׃ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>corn</n>
2: גֹּ֥רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>The floor</n> וָיֶ֖קֶב <sup>3342 </sup> <n>and the winepress</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יִרְעֵ֑ם <sup>7462 </sup> <n>shall not feed</n> וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>them and the new wine</n> יְכַ֥חֶשׁ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>shall fail</n> בָּֽהּ׃
3: לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יֵשְׁב֖וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>They shall not dwell</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְשָׁ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>669 </sup> <n>but Ephraim</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>to Egypt</n> וּבְאַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>[things] in Assyria</n> טָמֵ֥א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>unclean</n> יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and they shall eat</n>
4: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יִסְּכ֨וּ <sup>5258 </sup> <n>They shall not offer</n> לַיהוָ֥ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[offerings] to the LORD</n> יַיִן֮ <sup>3196 </sup> <n>wine</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֶֽעֶרְבוּ־ <sup>6148 </sup> <n>engage</n> לוֹ֒ זִבְחֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>2077 </sup> <n>unto him their sacrifices</n> כְּלֶ֤חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>[shall be] unto them as the bread</n> אוֹנִים֙ <sup>205 </sup> <n>of mourners</n> לָהֶ֔ם כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> אֹכְלָ֖יו <sup>398 </sup> <n>all that eat</n> יִטַמָּ֑אוּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>thereof shall be polluted</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> לַחְמָ֣ם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>for their bread</n> לְנַפְשָׁ֔ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for their soul</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>It will not</n> יָב֖וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall not come</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
5: מַֽה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>What will ye do</n> לְי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> מוֹעֵ֑ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>in the solemn</n> וּלְי֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and in the day</n> חַג־ <sup>2282 </sup> <n>of the feast</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Jehovah</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> הָֽלְכוּ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>For lo they are gone</n> מִשֹּׁ֔ד <sup>7701 </sup> <n>because of destruction</n> מִצְרַ֥יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>Egypt</n> תְּקַבְּצֵ֖ם <sup>6908 </sup> <n>shall gather them up</n> מֹ֣ף <sup>4644 </sup> <n>Memphis</n> תְּקַבְּרֵ֑ם <sup>6912 </sup> <n>shall bury</n> מַחְמַ֣ד <sup>4261 </sup> <n>them the pleasant</n> לְכַסְפָּ֗ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>[places] for their silver</n> קִמּוֹשׂ֙ <sup>7057 </sup> <n>nettles</n> יִֽירָשֵׁ֔ם <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall possess</n> ח֖וֹחַ <sup>2336 </sup> <n>them thorns</n> בְּאָהֳלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>[shall be] in their tabernacles</n>
7: בָּ֣אוּ ׀ <sup>935 </sup> <n>are come</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>The days</n> הַפְּקֻדָּ֗ה <sup>6486 </sup> <n>of visitation</n> בָּ֚אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>are come</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the days</n> הַשִׁלֻּ֔ם <sup>7966 </sup> <n>of recompence</n> יֵדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall know</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> אֱוִ֣יל <sup>191 </sup> <n>[is] a fool</n> הַנָּבִ֗יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>[it] the prophet</n> מְשֻׁגָּע֙ <sup>7696 </sup> <n>[is] mad</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הָר֔וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the spiritual</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Because</n> רֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>for the multitude</n> עֲוֹנְךָ֔ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>of thine iniquity</n> וְרַבָּ֖ה <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and the great</n> מַשְׂטֵמָֽה׃ <sup>4895 </sup> <n>hatred</n>
8: צֹפֶ֥ה <sup>6822 </sup> <n>The watchman</n> אֶפְרַ֖יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֱלֹהָ֑י <sup>430 </sup> <n>[was] with my God</n> נָבִ֞יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>[but] the prophet</n> פַּ֤ח <sup>6341 </sup> <n>[is] a snare</n> יָקוֹשׁ֙ <sup>3352 </sup> <n>of a fowler</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is in</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> דְּרָכָ֔יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in all his ways</n> מַשְׂטֵמָ֖ה <sup>4895 </sup> <n>[and] hatred</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in the house</n> אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of his God</n>
9: הֶעְמִֽיקוּ־ <sup>6009 </sup> <n>They have deeply</n> שִׁחֵ֖תוּ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>corrupted</n> כִּימֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[themselves] as in the days</n> הַגִּבְעָ֑ה <sup>1390 </sup> <n>of Gibeah</n> יִזְכּ֣וֹר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>[therefore] he will remember</n> עֲוֹנָ֔ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>their iniquity</n> יִפְק֖וֹד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>he will visit</n> חַטֹּאותָֽם׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>their sins</n> ס
10: כַּעֲנָבִ֣ים <sup>6025 </sup> <n>like grapes</n> בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> מָצָ֙אתִי֙ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>I found</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> כְּבִכּוּרָ֤ה <sup>1063 </sup> <n>as the firstripe</n> בִתְאֵנָה֙ <sup>8384 </sup> <n>in the fig tree</n> בְּרֵ֣אשִׁיתָ֔הּ <sup>7225 </sup> <n>at her first time</n> רָאִ֖יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I saw</n> אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>your fathers</n> הֵ֜מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> בָּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>[but] they went</n> בַֽעַל־ פְּע֗וֹר <sup>1187 </sup> <n>to Baalpeor</n> וַיִּנָּֽזְרוּ֙ <sup>5144 </sup> <n>and separated</n> לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <sup>1322 </sup> <n>themselves unto [that] shame</n> וַיִּהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> שִׁקּוּצִ֖ים <sup>8251 </sup> <n>and [their] abominations</n> כְּאָהֳבָֽם׃ <sup>157 </sup> <n>were according as they loved</n>
11: אֶפְרַ֕יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>[As for] Ephraim</n> כָּע֖וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>like a bird</n> יִתְעוֹפֵ֣ף <sup>5774 </sup> <n>shall fly away</n> כְּבוֹדָ֑ם <sup>3519 </sup> <n>their glory</n> מִלֵּדָ֥ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>from the birth</n> וּמִבֶּ֖טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>and from the womb</n> וּמֵהֵרָיֽוֹן׃ <sup>2032 </sup> <n>and from the conception</n>
12: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Yes</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> יְגַדְּלוּ֙ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>Though they bring up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>their children</n> וְשִׁכַּלְתִּ֖ים <sup>7921 </sup> <n>yet will I bereave</n> מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>them [that there shall] not [be] a man</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Yes</n> גַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>indeed</n> א֥וֹי <sup>188 </sup> <n>[left] yea woe</n> לָהֶ֖ם בְּשׂוּרִ֥י <sup>5493 </sup> <n>also to them when I depart</n> מֵהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
13: אֶפְרַ֛יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> רָאִ֥יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>as I saw</n> לְצ֖וֹר <sup>6865 </sup> <n>Tyrus</n> שְׁתוּלָ֣ה <sup>8362 </sup> <n>[is] planted</n> בְנָוֶ֑ה <sup>5116 </sup> <n>in a pleasant place</n> וְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>but Ephraim</n> לְהוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall bring forth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הֹרֵ֖ג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>to the murderer</n> בָּנָֽיו׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>his children</n>

15: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> רָעָתָ֤ם <sup>7451 </sup> <n>All their wickedness</n> בַּגִּלְגָּל֙ <sup>1537 </sup> <n>[is] in Gilgal</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> שְׂנֵאתִ֔ים <sup>8130 </sup> <n>for there I hated</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Because</n> רֹ֣עַ <sup>7455 </sup> <n>them for the wickedness</n> מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>4611 </sup> <n>of their doings</n> מִבֵּיתִ֖י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of mine house</n> אֲגָרְשֵׁ֑ם <sup>1644 </sup> <n>I will drive them out</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אוֹסֵף֙ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>them no more</n> אַהֲבָתָ֔ם <sup>160 </sup> <n>I will love</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> שָׂרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>8269 </sup> <n>all their princes</n> סֹרְרִֽים׃ <sup>5637 </sup> <n>[are] revolters</n>
16: הֻכָּ֣ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>is smitten</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> שָׁרְשָׁ֥ם <sup>8328 </sup> <n>their root</n> יָבֵ֖שׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>is dried up</n> פְּרִ֣י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>no fruit</n> [בְלִי־ כ] (בַֽל־ <sup>1097 </sup> <n>corruption</n> יַעֲשׂ֑וּן <sup>1077 </sup> <n>lest</n> ק) גַּ֚ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> יֵֽלֵד֔וּן <sup>3205 </sup> <n>yea though they bring forth</n> וְהֵמַתִּ֖י <sup>4191 </sup> <n>yet will I slay</n> מַחֲמַדֵּ֥י <sup>4261 </sup> <n>[even] the beloved</n> בִטְנָֽם׃ <sup>990 </sup> <n>[fruit] of their womb</n> ס
17: יִמְאָסֵ֣ם <sup>3988 </sup> <n>will cast them away</n> אֱלֹהַ֔י <sup>430 </sup> <n>My God</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שָׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>because they did not hearken</n> ל֑וֹ וְיִהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נֹדְדִ֖ים <sup>5074 </sup> <n>unto him and they shall be wanderers</n> בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the nations</n> ס
